Welcome.appDescription: A great tool for monitoring traffic and getting an overview of current events affecting your commute.
Welcome.featureMapDesc: Scroll and press current events to get a more in-depth description.
Welcome.featureListDesc: Detailed list of all events within your range. Report an ongoing event.
Welcome.featureMoreDesc: Adjust your notification preferences and register to unlock reporting feature.

More.tapToRegister: Tap to register or sign in
More.title: More settings

EventNotifications.title: Event notifications
EventNotifications.sliderInfo: The slider determines how big area you want to receive notifications from.
